verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <WH1732> I will praise <WH3034> you with my whole <WH3605> heart: <WH3820> before <WH5048> the gods <WH430> will I sing <WH2167> praise <WH2167> to you.

I will worship <WH7812> toward <WH413> your holy <WH6944> temple, <WH1964> and praise <WH3034> your name <WH8034> for your loving kindness <WH2617> and for your truth: <WH571> for you have magnified <WH1431> your word <WH565> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> your name. <WH8034>
In the day <WH3117> when I cried <WH7121> you answered <WH6030> me, and strengthened <WH7292> me with strength <WH5797> in my soul. <WH5315>
All <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> shall praise <WH3034> you, O LORD, <WH3068> when <WH3588> they hear <WH8085> the words <WH561> of your mouth. <WH6310>
Yes, they shall sing <WH7891> in the ways <WH1870> of the LORD: <WH3068> for great <WH1419> is the glory <WH3519> of the LORD. <WH3068>
Though <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> be high, <WH7311> yet has he respect <WH7200> to the lowly: <WH8217> but the proud <WH1364> he knows <WH3045> afar <WH4801> off.

Though <WH518> I walk <WH3212> in the middle <WH7130> of trouble, <WH6869> you will revive <WH2421> me: you shall stretch <WH7971> forth your hand <WH3027> against <WH5921> the wrath <WH639> of my enemies, <WH341> and your right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> shall save <WH3467> me.

The LORD <WH3068> will perfect <WH1584> that which concerns <WH1157> me: your mercy, <WH2617> O LORD, <WH3068> endures for ever: <WH5769> forsake <WH7503> not the works <WH4639> of your own hands. <WH3027>
